ValidationRule.description: Blocks Activation of an Order with no billing contact
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Opportunity.Bill_To_Account__r.Bill_To_Contact__c), Skout_Legacy_Order__c = FALSE, OR( TEXT(Status)="Activated", TEXT(Status)="Placed") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure a Bill To Contact is defined on the Bill To Account before activating this order.
